page.title: 33Sparetime
page.content:
We interviewed 82 children excluding ourselves and asked them what they did in their spare time.

33% played their computer games like X-box, Psp, Nintendo DS etc.

27% take part in sports activities like Judo, Football, Ice Skating etc. 24% played outside or with their friends, in the play park or on their bike or scooter.

6% take part in art activities,

5% bake

4% watch T.V.

However we found out that nobody went to their granâ€™s or church during their sparetime.


Milesmark Primary School
